item.description:
Dear Westborough Meetup members,

How are you?
I always want to know more about Buddha. How did he get enlightened? What was his major teaching?

I found out there was a TV show on PBS in couple months ago. I am luck to get a copy of that show. If you haven't watch it or would like to watch it again. You are very welcome.

Ice cream are served during and after movie, we can have a little discussion about the movie. See what we can learn from it.

Wish you all have a great summer
Jonathan
About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: This will be the second building on your right when you come into condos or 617-223-7166 when have trouble to find
item.name: Movie (buddha)
